help.simchecker: Activate instruction checking through golden model.
help.script: Specify the script used to launch the platform

help.py-stack: Display the full python stack in case an exception is caught

help.use_sdk_rom: Take the boot rom from the sdk instead of the platform.

info.help: CONTAINS NUMBER OF CORES [31:16] AND CLUSTERS [15:0]

corestatus.help: 32bit GP register to be used during testing to return EOC(bit[31]) and status(bit[30:0])

cs_ro.help: 32bit GP register to be used during testing to return EOC(bit[31]) and status(bit[30:0]) Read Only mirror

padfun0.help: sets the mux for pins  0 (bits [1:0]) to 15 (bits [31:30]

padfun1.help: sets the mux for pins  16 (bits [1:0]) to 31 (bits [31:30]

padfun2.help: sets the mux for pins  32 (bits [1:0]) to 47 (bits [31:30]

padfun3.help: sets the mux for pins  48 (bits [1:0]) to 63 (bits [31:30]

padcfg0.help: sets config for pin  0(bits [7:0]) to pin  3(bits [31:24])

padcfg1.help: sets config for pin  4(bits [7:0]) to pin  7(bits [31:24])

padcfg2.help: sets config for pin  8(bits [7:0]) to pin  11(bits [31:24])

padcfg3.help: sets config for pin  12(bits [7:0]) to pin  15(bits [31:24])

padcfg4.help: sets config for pin  16(bits [7:0]) to pin  19(bits [31:24])

padcfg5.help: sets config for pin  20(bits [7:0]) to pin  23(bits [31:24])

padcfg6.help: sets config for pin  24(bits [7:0]) to pin  27(bits [31:24])

padcfg7.help: sets config for pin  28(bits [7:0]) to pin  31(bits [31:24])

padcfg8.help: sets config for pin  32(bits [7:0]) to pin  35(bits [31:24])

padcfg9.help: sets config for pin  36(bits [7:0]) to pin  39(bits [31:24])

padcfg10.help: sets config for pin  40(bits [7:0]) to pin  43(bits [31:24])

padcfg11.help: sets config for pin  44(bits [7:0]) to pin  47(bits [31:24])

padcfg12.help: sets config for pin  48(bits [7:0]) to pin  51(bits [31:24])

padcfg13.help: sets config for pin  52(bits [7:0]) to pin  55(bits [31:24])

padcfg14.help: sets config for pin  56(bits [7:0]) to pin  59(bits [31:24])

padcfg15.help: sets config for pin  60(bits [7:0]) to pin  63(bits [31:24])
